document.full_text: german prosecutors demanded a six-year jail term tuesday for john demjanjuk, accused of helping kill 27,900 jews in the holocaust, at the end of what is likely to be the country's final war crimes trial.
document.title: german prosecutors want 6 years jail for john demjanjuk
lines_and_colors: german prosecutors demanded a six-year jail term tuesday for john demjanjuk, accused of helping kill 27,900 jews in the holocaust, at the end of what is likely to be the country's final war crimes trial.
